pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parallel Coordinate Plots in the 'ggplot2' Framework // Modern Parallel Coordinate Plots have been introduced in the 1980s as a way to visualize arbitrarily many numeric variables. This Grammar of Graphics implementation also incorporates categorical variables into the plots in a principled manner. By separating the data managing part from the visual rendering, we give full access to the users while keeping the number of parameters manageably low.
